name: Aviation Advocacy
goal: Aviation Advocacy represents interests in all parts of the avition industry.  Our aim to ensure the best possible regulation and governance of one of Europe's most important industies.  That requires informed, smart, thoughtful regulation.  We aim to help make that happen.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Single European Sky
The regulation of unmanned aerial vehicles
Passenger rights
ETS
Market access for airlines
Airport charges and slot regulations
Aeronautical spectrum issues
